info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 12:07AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong wind gusts from showers and weak thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Madison and Beaverhead Counties through 1245 AM MDT... At 1204 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles south of Jackson to 8 miles west of Lima. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Lima, Monida, Dell, Grant, Bannack Pass, Melrose, Lakeview, Bannack, Snowline, Glen, Beaverhead Rock State Park, Polaris, Clark Canyon, Bannack State Park, and Monida Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
